text: ya ne zayavlyayu shcho ya volodiyu skarbamy BOHA, ne roblyu ya znayu maybutnye, ne roblyu ya zayavlyayu buty anhel. Ne robyty ya skazhu tsym despised vashymy ochamy shcho BOH ne podaruye bud π-yakym blahoslovennyu na nykh. BOH znaye krashchyy shcho u yikhnikh nayhlybshykh dumkakh. (Yakshcho ya tse,) ya by buv porushnyk
